# Explorers
Similar to you, these courageous individuals are motivated by the urge to investigate deserted facilities for valuable equipment, encounters with life forms (both friendly and hostile), or anything else intriguing. However, unlike you, they do not possess the license to operate in NT-controlled space.
# Known variants # "Looter"
Armed with trusty pickaxe and greed.

Drilling in the name of... Drilling. No rock formation can withstand the power of dual-wielded mining drills.

Wealthy enough salvager to explore abandoned ruins not for profit, but for the thrill of discovery and adrenaline rush.
- [bold][color=#a4885c]Health thresholds:[/color][/bold] 100 (crit), 130 (death) - [bold][color=#a4885c]Run (walk) speed:[/color][/bold] 4.5 m/s (2.5 m/s) - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage (type):[/color][/bold] 20 [color=red]Blunt[/color] - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage resistances:[/color][/bold] [color=red]Blunt[/color], [color=red]Slash[/color] and [color=yellow]Piercing[/color] 10%; [color=orange]Heat[/color] 5%; [color=orange]Caustic[/color] 10% - [bold][color=#a4885c]Special abilities:[/color][/bold] Shooter (wielded PKA)
# "Hauler"
Heavy equipment for industrial-scale looting. Pardon me, "asset recovery".
[color=#a4885c]Immunity[/color]: invulnerable to specific types of damage.

# "Explorer captain"
Fearless and battle-hardened leader of the salvager team who has spent years navigating the treacherous "waters" of the galaxy, scouring for valuable resources and relics to sell on the black market.
- [bold][color=#a4885c]Health thresholds:[/color][/bold] 100 (crit), 130 (death) - [bold][color=#a4885c]Run (walk) speed:[/color][/bold] 4.5 m/s (2.5 m/s) - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage (type):[/color][/bold] 20 [color=red]Blunt[/color] - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage resistances:[/color][/bold] [color=red]Blunt[/color], [color=red]Slash[/color] and [color=yellow]Piercing[/color] 25%; [color=orange]Heat[/color] 20%; [color=orange]Caustic[/color] 10% - [bold][color=#a4885c]Special abilities:[/color][/bold] Shooter (dual sawn-off PKA)
# Missions objectives ## Elimination
Eliminate large and dangerous creature - [color=#a4885c]explorer captain[/color] within given time constraints to earn a monetary reward.
## Destruction
Destroy a certain amount of [color=#a4885c]salvage radars[/color] within given time constraints to earn a monetary reward.
